In a dystopian future, it's man versus machine We call them Heroes, human guardians who fight against Metalians
These cyborgs have lost their humanity and are controlled by a powerful AI system called Code Metal.
METAL is the substance
they fight for and is the
only thing that can make
them stronger
through enhanced weaponry and analog modifications to their mind and bodies.
Although hope is nearly lost for humanity Heroes still have some strength if they can survive the next battle
and gather enough METAL to defeat the machines. The Heroesâ€™ spirit for battle has waned significantly, while the Metalians surge in numbers and in strength

are needed. You are needed!

NFT Play to Earn Battle Simulator Where Heroes Battle for METAL
Exclusive on ICON, Code Metal is a battle-to-earn, on-chain battle simulator, with a unique collection of 4999 Hero NFTs built on the ICON blockchain. It`s the first game that Upgradable NFTs are used in a Battle Simulator P2E game.
Sale
4999 Hero NFTs can be minted with $ICX. Gen 0 Heroes will cost 150 $ICX for whitelist and 200 $ICX in public sale.
Upgrade
Higher level Heroes earn more rewards. Higher levels are increasingly harder to reach, as the amount of $METAL you need to burn to purchase the next level increases. This not only increases the battle level of your Heroes, but their desirability too, as it permanently upgrades their on-chain metadata.
Battle-to-Earn Game-Ready
To play the game, you need to mint at least one Hero NFT. One Hero can target exactly one enemy. On every kill enemies drop rewards, rewards differ based on the strength of the enemy. Choose your battles wisely!
METAL Halvening
METAL is a limited resource. As more Heroes fight, the number of tokens will steadily decrease as the game progresses.
limited resource. As more Heroes
f(x) = S*I^x
4999 Heroes

Our 4999 algorithmically generated Heroes are no ordinary NFTs. They are simply the beginning of a much larger ecosystem. Each hero is unique both in their looks and their Combat Stats. ALL 4999 Heroes generate $METAL the fuel that is burned to run the Code Metal ecosystem.
